description: Technical socks built for maximum warmth and dryness while cross-country skiing. A mesh overfoot enhances moisture management, while strategic padding in the toebox, underfoot, heel and Achilles area provides minimal slippage when you're skate skiing like Brittany Webster or Devon Kershaw.Made of a wool and synthetic blend for moisture management and temperature regulation.Cushion-loop construction protects the leg and the foot against the cold.Flat toe seam for added comfort.
name: Bridgedale Cross Country Ski Socks - Unisex
